post:
![](http://virmach.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/virmach.png)

Today we have another amazing exclusive offer for LowEndTalk. VirMach has been a VPS provider for over a year now and we have a wide range of services that we offer in various locations. This week we have large discounts for three different plans. We use SolusVM for management and guarantee 99.9% uptime. You may select the location of the datacenter you prefer, but the locations offered vary for each plan. The offers are recurring, meaning you will receive the discount on renewal. However, offers expire August 10, 2015. Limit one per offer per customer. Discount pricing will show on final page of checkout.

**KVM HDD - KVM256**
<br />256MB DDR3 RAM
<br />2 vCores
<br />15GB HDD
<br />1TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
<br />1 IPv4 - Additional Available
<br />Linux, KVM Virtualization
<br />Locations: Dallas, Phoenix
<br />[Order Now $1.00/M](https://virmach.com/manage/cart.php?a=add&pid=60&promocode=LETKVM256) - Save $2.00 
<br /> **COUPON CODE LETKVM256**
<br /> _OFFER EXPIRES AUGUST 10 - WILL BECOME 20% OFF CODE AFTERWARD_

**KVM SSD-Cached - WinPRO X1+**
<br />1GB DDR3 RAM
<br />1 vCore @ 3.6GHz
<br />24GB SSD-Cached
<br />1TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
<br />1 IPv4 - Additional Available
<br />Windows Server 2012 R2 or Linux
<br />Locations: Dallas, Phoenix
<br />[Order Now $3.00/M](https://virmach.com/manage/cart.php?a=add&pid=70&promocode=LETWINPRO1X1) - Save $7.00
<br /> **COUPON CODE LETWINPRO1X1**
<br /> _OFFER EXPIRES AUGUST 10 - WILL BECOME 20% OFF CODE AFTERWARD_

**OpenVZ HDD - Medium**
<br />2GB DDR3 RAM
<br />2 vCores
<br />200GB HDD
<br />2TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
<br />1 IPv4 - Additional Available
<br />Linux, OpenVZ Virtualization
<br />Locations: Phoenix, Buffalo, Los Angeles
<br />[Order Now $5.00/M](https://virmach.com/manage/cart.php?a=add&pid=5&promocode=LETMEDIUM) - Save $5.00
<br /> **COUPON CODE LETMEDIUM**
<br /> _OFFER EXPIRES AUGUST 10 - WILL BECOME 20% OFF CODE AFTERWARD_

_**Discount is applied at final page of checkout. This promotion expires Monday, August 10, so hurry! The coupons will still be valid after this period, but they will be changed to a 20% off code.**_

ToS: http://virmach.com/terms-conditions

We offer refunds up to 24 hours after purchase. Offer valid once per customer. Please feel free to [contact](http://virmach.com/help-center/) our sales department with any questions you have; we can customize your plan to your needs if you require larger plans.
